name: Casino Surfers - Joe’s 3D Endless Flying Las Vegas Escape Through The Strip
name_original: Casino Surfers - Joe’s 3D Endless Flying Las Vegas Escape Through The Strip
description:
From the subway to the casino slot machines, Casino Surfer brings you a wild adventure ride!

Casino Joe was not making money at the poker table so he decided to surf his way out of harms way and into the streets of Las Vegas! You need to help him drive his car over the ocean of obstacles and poker chips so he can escape from the police! You never imagined a surfer experience like this.

Game Features include:
- Awesome 3D Graphics based in Las Vegas with a flying car
- Power ups to increase your points and speed
- Multiple view angles and levels
- Casino, surfer music
- Normal mode and Survivor Mode game play
- Hit the subway of Las Vegas!
- Swipe left and right to control easily


Casino Surfer is the top new game to surf your car around tons of different and wild obstacles which gives you a complete new visual challenge in this endless running game.
Once start the game, you will see the police chasing you...so don't stop! This is much better than the temple, street, cave, ninja or zombie run, feel the experience of this 3D running game for casino survival. During the game you have keep clear of unexpected obstacles by ducking, jumping, and sliding.

There have been many that tried and few that can create top 3D endless runner games that have surfer physics - this is it!
